hotel_name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
review_text: Bad: We parked our car in the hotel parking and the second day we realized that somebody had broken in. Somehow we didn't find Las Vegas a safe place to travel. Solely for leisure, I will not return to US again. Not value for money. Good: It was one of the cheapest places we found in Las Vegas during those days.
review_title: Dirty, expensive, unsafe place, money trap
